verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: is] hosting Queen Letizia of Spain for afternoon tea in the red room of the White House on Tuesday as their husbands meet in the Oval Office .

[ARG0: Melania Trump] is [V: hosting] [ARG1: Queen Letizia of Spain] [ARGM-PRP: for afternoon tea] [ARGM-LOC: in the red] [ARGM-PRP: room of the White House] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: as their husbands meet in the Oval Office] .
Melania Trump is hosting Queen Letizia of Spain for afternoon tea in the red room of the White House on Tuesday as [ARG0: their husbands] [V: meet] [ARGM-LOC: in the Oval Office] .
